definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: I often play puzzles and Legos at home.
sentences.chinese: 我經常在家玩猜謎遊戲和玩積木。

sentences.english: How many colours are there for 2x4 LEGO brick?
sentences.chinese: 樂高2x4積木塊有多少種顏色呢？

sentences.english: I see fifteen blocks on the table!
Let me remind you what these building blocks are.
sentences.chinese: 讓我來提醒你們一下這些積木都是什麼。

sentences.english: A feature extraction algorithm for module-player robot′s machine vision system is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了搭積木機器人機器視覺系統的特徵提取算法。

sentences.english: A routing system for building-block layout is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡述了一種積木塊式版圖佈線系統。

sentences.english: But I can be happy and building at home.
sentences.chinese: 但我開心地在家搭積木。

sentences.english: This Lego Pouch really fits well within the realm of acceptable geeky accessories.
sentences.chinese: 這個樂高積木的手袋真的很適合做潮流配飾。

sentences.english: Act 2 is similar, except that the orange block is smaller.
sentences.chinese: 第二幕類似，不同的是橘紅色積木比較小。

sentences.english: What the little boy likes to do most is putting together building blocks.
sentences.chinese: 這個小男孩最喜歡做的事就是搭積木。

sentences.english: Building blocks is what the boy likes most.
sentences.chinese: 這個小男孩最喜歡做的事就是搭積木。

sentences.english: The software employs the modular design.
sentences.chinese: 軟件設計採用模塊化積木式。

sentences.english: All the devices adopt blocking structure, can update and maintain comfortably.
sentences.chinese: 設備採用積木式結構，方便升級和維護。

sentences.english: The whole valve body is a building block type composite structure.
sentences.chinese: 閥整體爲“積木式”組合結構。

definition: to pile up/to put layer upon layer/(Tw) (computing) stack
